text: Simon Moore may refer to: * Simon Moore (Royal Navy officer) (born 1946), former Royal Navy officer and former Assistant Chief of Defence Staff * Simon Moore (lawyer), see Pitcairn sexual assault trial of 2004 * Simon Moore (writer) (), British screenplay writer * Simon Moore (footballer) (born 1990), English football (soccer) goalkeeper * Simon Moore (Derbyshire cricketer) (born 1974), former English cricketer, played for Derbyshire in 1999 and 2003 * Simon Moore (Essex cricketer) (born 1973), English cricketer, played for Essex 2000–01 == See also == *Simon More, MP for Great Yarmouth (UK Parliament constituency) in 1553
title: Simon Moore
